mapper.insert: insert into permission_api (permission_id, api_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{apiId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into permission_api
permission_id,
api_id,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
